verses.verse: Why <S%H4100><s%> <S%H5975>standest<s%> thou afar <S%H7350>off,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD?<s%> why <S%H5956>hidest<s%> thou thyself in <S%H6256>times<s%> of <S%H6869>trouble?<s%>

The <S%H7563>wicked<s%> in his <S%H1346>pride<s%> doth <S%H1814>persecute<s%> the <S%H6041>poor:<s%> let them be <S%H8610>taken<s%> in the <S%H4209>devices<s%> <S%H2098>that<s%> they have <S%H2803>imagined.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H1984>boasteth<s%> <S%H5921>of<s%> his <S%H5315>heart's<s%> <S%H8378>desire,<s%> and <S%H1288>blesseth<s%> the <S%H1214>covetous,<s%> whom the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5006>abhorreth.<s%>

The <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> through the <S%H1363>pride<s%> of his <S%H639>countenance,<s%> will <S%H1077>not<s%> <S%H1875>seek<s%> after God: <S%H430>God<s%> is <S%H369>not<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H4209>thoughts.<s%>

His <S%H1870>ways<s%> are <S%H3605>always<s%> <S%H6256><s%> <S%H2342>grievous;<s%> thy <S%H4941>judgments<s%> are far <S%H4791>above<s%> out of his <S%H4480>sight:<s%> <S%H5048><s%> as for <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H6887>enemies,<s%> he <S%H6315>puffeth<s%> at them.

He hath <S%H559>said<s%> in his <S%H3820>heart,<s%> I shall <S%H1077>not<s%> be <S%H4131>moved:<s%> for I shall <S%H1755>never<s%> <S%H1755><s%> <S%H834><s%> <S%H3808><s%> be in <S%H7451>adversity.<s%>

His <S%H6310>mouth<s%> is <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H423>cursing<s%> and <S%H4820>deceit<s%> and <S%H8496>fraud:<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> his <S%H3956>tongue<s%> is <S%H5999>mischief<s%> and <S%H205>vanity.<s%>

He <S%H3427>sitteth<s%> in the lurking <S%H3993>places<s%> of the <S%H2691>villages:<s%> in the secret <S%H4565>places<s%> doth he <S%H2026>murder<s%> the <S%H5355>innocent:<s%> his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> are privily <S%H6845>set<s%> against the <S%H2489>poor.<s%>

He lieth in <S%H693>wait<s%> <S%H4565>secretly<s%> as a <S%H738>lion<s%> in his <S%H5520>den:<s%> he lieth in <S%H693>wait<s%> to <S%H2414>catch<s%> the <S%H6041>poor:<s%> he doth <S%H2414>catch<s%> the <S%H6041>poor,<s%> when he <S%H4900>draweth<s%> him into his <S%H7568>net.<s%>
He <S%H1794>croucheth,<s%> and <S%H7817>humbleth<s%> himself, that the <S%H2489>poor<s%> may <S%H5307>fall<s%> by his strong <S%H6099>ones.<s%>

He hath <S%H559>said<s%> in his <S%H3820>heart,<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> hath <S%H7911>forgotten:<s%> he <S%H5641>hideth<s%> his <S%H6440>face;<s%> he will <S%H1077>never<s%> <S%H5331><s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> it.
Arise, <S%H6965><s%> O <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> O <S%H410>God,<s%> lift <S%H5375>up<s%> thine <S%H3027>hand:<s%> <S%H7911>forget<s%> <S%H408>not<s%> the <S%H6035>humble.<s%>

Wherefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H4100><s%> doth the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H5006>contemn<s%> <S%H430>God?<s%> he hath <S%H559>said<s%> in his <S%H3820>heart,<s%> Thou wilt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1875>require<s%> it.

Thou hast <S%H7200>seen<s%> it; <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H5027>beholdest<s%> <S%H5999>mischief<s%> and <S%H3708>spite,<s%> to <S%H5414>requite<s%> it with thy <S%H3027>hand:<s%> the <S%H2489>poor<s%> <S%H5800>committeth<s%> himself <S%H5921>unto<s%> thee; <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H1961>art<s%> the <S%H5826>helper<s%> of the <S%H3490>fatherless.<s%>

Break <S%H7665><s%> thou the <S%H2220>arm<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> and the <S%H7451>evil<s%> man: seek <S%H1875>out<s%> his <S%H7562>wickedness<s%> till thou <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H1077>none.<s%>
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is <S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H5769>forever<s%> and <S%H5703>ever:<s%> the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> are <S%H6>perished<s%> out of his <S%H4480>land.<s%> <S%H776><s%>

LORD, <S%H3068><s%> thou hast <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H8378>desire<s%> of the <S%H6035>humble:<s%> thou wilt <S%H3559>prepare<s%> their <S%H3820>heart,<s%> thou wilt cause thine <S%H241>ear<s%> to hear: <S%H7181><s%>

To <S%H8199>judge<s%> the <S%H3490>fatherless<s%> and the <S%H1790>oppressed,<s%> that the <S%H582>man<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> may <S%H1077>no<s%> <S%H3254>more<s%> <S%H5750><s%> <S%H6206>oppress.<s%>
